create.not-user: You must be a user to create a ticket

ticket.not-involved: You don't have permission to see this ticket

answer.not-involved: You don't have permission to answer this ticket

close.not-involved: You don't have permission to close this ticket

rate.not-involved: You don't have permission to rate this ticket

assign.not-involved: You don't have permission to assign this ticket

deparment.not-involved: You don't have permission to assign this ticket's deparment

reports.not-involved: You don't have permission to see this reports
